headline.main: JAPAN IS MEETING ECONOMIC DEFEAT; 'Co-Prosperity' for Occupied Area Is Blocked by Lack of Markets and Transport

lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, India, Aug. 31 -- Official Japanese statements confirm evidence from other sources, which your correspondent is not at liberty to specify, that Japan's boasted "co-prosperity" in Southeastern Asia has everywhere meant a disastrous economic depression.
abstract: H A Standish on econ failure of Jap co-prosperity sphere
